mapper.select:
select * from t_jymxsq_cl where yxbz = '1'
order by ${params.orderBy}

select * from t_jymxsq_cl where yxbz = '1'
and sqlsh = ${sqlsh}

select * from t_jymxsq_cl where 1 = 1 and yxbz = '1'
#{sqlsh}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_jymxsq_cl (sqlsh, ddh, kpddm, hsbz, spmxxh, fphxz, spdm, spmc, spggxh, spzxbm, yhzcbs, yhzcmc, lslbz, spdw, sps, spdj, spje, spsl, spse, kce, jshj, hzkpxh, lrsj, lrry, xgsj, xgry, gsdm, skpid, xfid, yxbz, spid, ykjje, kkjje, spbz) values
(#{item.sqlsh},#{item.ddh},#{item.kpddm},#{item.hsbz},#{item.spmxxh},#{item.fphxz}, #{item.spdm},#{item.spmc},#{item.spggxh},#{item.spzxbm},#{item.yhzcbs}, #{item.yhzcmc},#{item.lslbz},#{item.spdw},#{item.sps},#{item.spdj}, #{item.spje},#{item.spsl},#{item.spse},#{item.kce},#{item.jshj}, #{item.hzkpxh},#{item.lrsj},#{item.lrry},#{item.xgsj},#{item.xgry}, #{item.gsdm},#{item.skpid},#{item.xfid},#{item.yxbz},#{item.spid}, #{item.ykjje},#{item.kkjje},#{item.spbz})
